title: Muzhumathi Muzhumathi Lyrics Kanimozhi
stanzas:
Muzhumadhi muzhumadhi
nilavai kaeladi
muzhuvadhum muzhuvadhum
unmai thaanadi
kadhalil karaindhavan
enpoal yaaradiyo..

ethanai ethanai
kadhal paarthadhu
ethanai ethanai
kanavai kaettadhu
enpol yaarume illai
endrathu kel o ho oho

Muzhumadhi muzhumadhi
nilavai kaeladi
muzhuvadhum muzhuvadhum
unmai thaanadi
kadhalil karaindhavan
enpoal yaaradiyo..

kaaviyak kaadhal
aayiram kadhaigal
boomikku sonnadhadi
ninaivugalodu vazhvadhu
enthan kadhal sollumadi.

ulagathil sirantha
idam adhai thaedi
unthan idhayam
vanthene vanthene

un viral koarkkum
nimidathil enthan
thanimaike thanimai
thanthene thanthene

Muzhumadhi muzhumadhi
nilavai kaeladi
muzhuvadhum muzhuvadhum
unmai thaanadi
kadhalil karaindhavan
enpoal yaaradiyo..

Muzhumadhi muzhumadhi
nilavai kaeladi
muzhuvadhum muzhuvadhum
unmai thaanadi
kadhalil karaindhavan
enpoal yaaradiyo..

muzhumadhi muzhumadhi
nilavum sonnadhu
muzhuvadhum muzhuvadhum
unmai thaanadhu
unpol yaarum illai endrathu.

seo.title: Muzhumathi Muzhumathi Lyrics Kanimozhi
seo.description: Get the complete Muzhumathi Muzhumathi Lyrics Kanimozhi from Kanimozhi. Read the lyrics penned by Na Muthukumar and composed by Satish Chakravarthy and sung by Bella Shinde. Perfect for fans looking for the full Tamil text and song meaning.
seo.keywords: Na Muthukumar, Kanimozhi, Satish Chakravarthy, Bella Shinde, Vijay Yesudas, Tamil lyrics, Tamil songs
